The claim processing for Sarah Wilson's critical illness claim (stroke) has been completed. Unfortunately, the payment could not be processed due to an invalid bank account number. The final outcome is "payment_failed." The details of the workflow and the audit trail have been saved successfully.

If you need further assistance or wish to correct the bank details, please let me know!
